column4: I keep finding tutorials on using ssh config and going through a jump host using nc. Unfortunately nc isn't available on the jump host.
KrazyKriv, basically, it won't work. Microsoft doesn't  follow the rules on UPnP, so nothing that isn't Microsoft will work with it.
there are no other apps that will allow me to media stream to xbox or even ps3?
i have used a great streamer/transcriber that worked on Windows
